'''Broken Isle Mural''' is a Quest Item obtainable from the Event [[World Quest]], "[[The Other Side of Isle and Sea]]." The Quest can be started by interacting with any of the [[Golden Apple Archipelago/1.6|Golden Apple Archipelago]]'s Murals.

The mural is on a cave wall. The entrance to the cave is hidden by a [[Wind-Blessed Harpastum|Dodo-King's Painted Wall]].

The mural tells which level each lake should be at to solve the [[Broken Isle/1.6#Mural Lake Puzzle|Mural Lake Puzzle]]

{{Quote|The more Paimon looks at these five things, the more they look like cups with water in them.|Paimon, after completing [[The Other Side of Isle and Sea]]}}
